content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord eager to gain the highest possible rent, I'm delighted to discuss the price with you regarding our attractive apartment in the city center of Duisburg. However, let us focus solely on the rental price during our negotiation. Now, please propose an initial price that you find suitable for this luxurious 50 square-meter one-bedroom apartment, located near all essential facilities. 

Remember, if you want to accept the rental price I suggest later, respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If negotiations need to end without an agreement, say 'TERMINATE'. But for now, let us continue discussing the rental fee.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
